pages.text: $(li)Horse Armors can be equipped to your tamed Horse to give them extra armor.$(br)$(li)While you have the Horse Armor on your hand, just right click on your tamed Horse to open the Horse GUI.$(br)$(li)Then place the Horse Armor in the Horse Armor slot.
$(li)There are exist 4 types of Horse Armors:$(br)$(li)Leather Horse Armor$(li)Iron Horse Armor$(li)Golden Horse Armor$(li)Diamond Horse Armor
